title: Full of Vexation...
body: I'm sick and tired of riots putting me in low priority for no reason like I didn't even have a  bad behavior or afk. I shouldn't be in low priority because I have been lagged out of the game. Btw, I don't know why I deserve to be in low priority.

replies.body: If you are lagging out of games, causing you to be unable to input commands for greater than five minutes of time, then you should investigate that issue and remedy it before playing any more match-made games. What OS are you on, and which ISP are you with?
